root.name: Top Striker
root.description: OverviewBeing the only title based on the TV Anime Moero! Top Striker, the game is played on a left-right perspective. Unlike in any other common soccer games of its time, it is only possible to control a single soccer player (star player) who possesses a special shot. The teams are based on soccer teams from Italy. These includes Napoli and Milan, for example. There are also national teams like England, Germany and Italy.TriviaThe anime is known in Italy as A tutto goal, and in France as L'Ã‰cole des champions.
